text.__SUMMARY__: Solanum tobagense is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae. It is found in Guyana, Trinidad and Tobago, and Venezuela.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Solanum tobagense". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T35479A9934894. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T35479A9934894.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
